properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 8 at 4:45AM EST by NWS Buffalo NY
properties.description:
A band of lake effect snow producing snow fall rates of up to an
inch will continue from near Ellisburg and Mannsville in Jefferson
county to near Montague in Lewis county through 6 am.

Thunder and lightning is occurring within the heaviest portion of
the snow band.

Locations impacted include...
Sandy Island Beach State Park, Lowville, Adams, Barnes Corners,
Whetstone Gulf State Park, Southwick Beach State Park, New Bremen,
Watson, Martinsburg, Lyonsdale, Greig, Lorraine, Sandy Creek, Port
Leyden, Lacona, Lyons Falls, Mannsville, Ellisburg, Turin and Worth.

This includes Interstate 81 between exits 37 and 40.

Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be
prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra
time when traveling.

NWSheadline: A BAND OF LAKE EFFECT SNOW WILL AFFECT SOUTH CENTRAL JEFFERSON... SOUTHWESTERN LEWIS AND NORTHEASTERN OSWEGO COUNTIES
